* Extra Notes:

Important:

[quote]- You can't join in original servers, only cracked!

1. Apply this steamworks fix to your game folder.
2. Start Steam and login to your (perf FAKE) account.
3. Start the game.
4. When you're in-game, go to Play --> Multiplayer
5. Go to "FILTER" and type in Host "REVOLT".[/quote]
